name: Mono's Dungeon
description:
This is a short game made in 24h with the Godot Engine (https://godotengine.org/).
I wanted to create a small RPG similar to Ultima Underworld. Of course, in a much simpler version.

Story:
You have been thrown into the dungeon by Mono, the king of the dwarfs. However if you are able to escape, he'll allows you to leave his kingdom unharmed.
Though as you'll see there is a catch to that offer...
